txt.en:
The sword-hilt appears to be of Westernesse-make, but the blade has been overlaid with writings in Black Speech. Among the dark writings, you can make out the name Mánas.

You should take the blade to Nethraw at the Krúslë Lannan to the east of Gabilshathûr.

'Hail, [placeholder], have you returned one of the swords that were taken from Krúslë Lannan?\n\n'You have brought to me the sword of Mánas. Many brave warriors fell beneath this blade, though he wielded the bow stronger. Few men lived to tell tales of his brutality, for he would often put his captives to a cruel death.'
You have recovered one of the seven swords of Krúslë Lannan, you should return it to Nethraw.
Bring the Sword of Mánas to Nethraw
Nethraw can be found at the Krúslë Lannan, east of Gabilshathûr.\n\nYou should take the sword you found to Nethraw.
